name: Free Bee
description: Free Bee is the easiest and most convenient calling app to keep in-touch with your loved ones!  Make international calls every day to your familys landline or cellphone using the Free Bee app  The best part? The person you are calling doesnt need internet connection or a smart phone to receive the calls!  Why is Free Bee the best calling app for you?  MAKE FREE CALLS TO THE PHILIPPINES! Simply watch a video ad and be rewarded with a free 2-minute international call to the Philippines every day!  ENJOY PREMIUM CALLS AT THE LOWEST RATES If the 2-minute FREE calls are not enough, you can purchase Free Bee premium call credits for an ad-free calling experience. Enjoy the most affordable international call rates to the Philippines - as low as USD 0.01 per minute! Packages start at USD 2 for 100 minutes. *Valid for calls made to PLDT, Smart, TNT or Sun Cellular numbers in the Philippines.  Whats new with Free Bee?  FREE BEE INTERNATIONAL CALL PLANS! We launched our affordable international call plans to select countries so that the families of OFWs, Migrants and alike can initiate calls to their loved ones in USA, Hawaii, Canada, and more countries to come! Driven by our desire to keep LONG-DISTANCE RELATIONSHIPS strong, our digital campaign is dubbed LDR CALLS, para sa Tawagang Walang Iwanan.  What are you waiting for? Download Free Bee today and stay connected!   Terms and conditions apply, for more information please visit: http://www.freebeecalls.com/terms-conditions/
